full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUS CE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Servic OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, KRISHAN K RAN GRA residing at 4 AUBURN PLACE (Name) (Street and Number) PRINCETON JUNCTION NJ 08550 (City) (State) (ZIP Code if in U.S.) (Country) BEING DULY SWORN DEPOSE AND SAY: 1. I was born on 08-11-1943 at Hariana, HOSHIARPUR, PANJAB, INDIA (Date) (City) (Country) If you are not a native born United States citizen, answer the following as appropriate: a. If a United States citizen through naturalization, give certificate of naturalization number 122 40 248 b. If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give citizenship certificate number C. If United States citizenship was derived by some other method, attach a statement of explanation. d. If a lawfully admitted permanent resident of the United States, give 'A' number 2. That I am 48 years of age and have resided in the United States since (date) OCTOBER 1976 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person: KUNDAN LAL RANGRA M 84 (Age) year (Name) (Sex) INDIA widower Father (Citizen of - Country) (Marital Status) (Relationship to Deponent) (Presently resides at - Street and Number) (City) (State) (Country) 4. That this affidavit is made by me for the purpose of assuring the United States Government that the person named in item 3 will not become a public charge in the United States. 5. That I am willing and able to receive, maintain and support the person named in item 3. That I am ready and willing to deposit a bond, if necessary, to guarantee that such person will not become a public charge during his or her stay in the United States, or to guarantee that the above named will maintain his or her nonimmigrant status if admitted temporarily and will depart prior to the expiration of his or her authorized stay in the United States. 6. That I understand this affidavit will be binding upon me for a period of three (3) years after entry of the person named in item 3 and that the information and documenation provided by me may be made available to the Secretary of Health and Human Services. 7. That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of Data Processing with Merrill lynch CO (Type of business (Name of concern) at 400 College Road, Princeton NEW Jersey (Street and Number) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) I derive an annual income of (if self-employed, I have attached a copy of my last income tax return or report of commercial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. See instruction for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted.) $ 96,855.00 I have on deposit in savings banks in the United States $ 35000,00 I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is 40000.00 I have stocks and bonds with the following market value, as indicated on the attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. 115000.00 I have life insurance in the sum of $ 75000,00 With a cash surrender value of $ I own real estate valued at 285000.00 With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to 184000.00 Which is located at (Street 4 AUBURN and number) Place, Princeton (City) (State) NJ 08550 (ZIP Code) Form I-134 (Rev. 9-30-80) N
